channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Rieker Footwear
channel.desc: Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Sale up to 50% Off
channel.desc: Masai Clothing Sale up to 50% Off.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: The Jewellery Box
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Phase Eight
channel.desc: Up to 50% Off Phase Eight.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: New Season Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Join us to discover the Apricot fashion styles that your wardrobe needs to help you transition smoothly into the coming season.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonds
channel.desc: Dedicated to lovers of diamond jewellery, this show presents a range of 9 carat gold jewellery that combines diamonds with amethyst, garnet, peridot, blue topaz, citrine and other favourite gemstones.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: New Season Fashion
channel.desc: Kick start your January with a fabulous wardrobe update! You're cordially invited to join us for an exclusive look at our all of our new fashion offers here at QVC.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Nightwear Edit
channel.desc: Update your nightwear collection with our fabulous selection of comfy pyjamas, snuggly robes and soft, stylish nightdresses. You'll be all set for snooze time.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Centigrade up to 50% off
channel.desc: Whatever your outerwear needs, Centigrade has it covered! You'll find a wide variety of coats and jackets in different styles, designs and materials - all with up to 50% off.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonds
channel.desc: Dedicated to lovers of diamond jewellery, this show presents a range of 9 carat gold jewellery that combines diamonds with amethyst, garnet, peridot, blue topaz, citrine and other favourite gemstones.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Fashion on Friday with Julia
channel.desc: Offering great colours, quality fabrics and exciting fashion designs for every woman. Treat yourself and go shopping with Julia Roberts.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Kim & Co
channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Moda In Pelle
channel.desc: Discover fashionable footwear from Moda In Pelle which combines affordable luxury and complete comfort for you.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Up to 50% Off Phase Eight
channel.desc: Up to 50% Off Phase Eight.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: New Season Helene Berman London
channel.desc: Join us now to take a peek at Helene Berman London's latest fashion and accessories designs, and prep your wardrobe for the coming autumn/winter season.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Masai Clothing Copenhagen
channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Diamonique Under ?30 with Julia
channel.desc: Treat yourself to glittering jewellery from the Diamonique range, with gorgeous designs all under ?30.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Discover Apricot fashion, showcasing chic wardrobe staples and elegant pieces to bring your style to life. From fabulous prints to bold pops of colours, discover how you can enliven your look today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Rieker Footwear
channel.desc: Rieker offers footwear designed to be flexible, roomy, light and well cushioned. Following trends in the marketplace, Rieker provides classic footwear to women of all ages.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Discover Plants with Michael...
channel.desc: Join QVC's gardening expert Michael Perry as he shares knowledge on every aspect of your garden. He'll introduce you to the finest plants that make the most of your outdoor space during summer.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: YouGarden
channel.desc: Discover beautiful plants and all the garden essentials you need, from You Garden.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Apricot Clothing
channel.desc: Discover Apricot fashion, showcasing chic wardrobe staples and elegant pieces to bring your style to life. From fabulous prints to bold pops of colours, discover how you can enliven your look today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: 30 Years with Butler & Wilson
channel.desc: Celebrate 30 sparkling years of Butler & Wilson jewellery, renowned for radiant crystal pieces that will turn heads whenever you wear them. Find your fabulous right here at QVC.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne Fashion Collection

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Handbag Must Haves
channel.desc: Find your new favourite bag in this showcase of must-have handbags, from gorgeous totes to clever cross-bodies. Discover yours today.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Frank Usher
channel.desc: Discover elegant clothing and accessories from Frank Usher. Designed for the modern woman, these beautiful designs will add a touch of sparkle and glamour to your wardrobe with comfort in mind.

channel.name: QVC Style UK
channel.title: Plants2Gardens
channel.desc: Specialising in mature plants for instant impact, Plants2Gardens offer a huge array of vibrant, colourful blooms to help transform your outdoor space and bring your garden to life.
